Sequence Information.Source: bioinformatic predicted bacterial nonribosomal gene cluster,Brevibacillus brevisNBRC 100599, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (47.06%) toGramicidin BV: 46%.Chemical modification: head-to-tail cyclization (XXC);Activity: active against B. subtilis 168 1A1 (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. faecium Com15 (MIC 32 ug/ml), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 16 ug/ml), E-coli DH5alpha (MIC>64 ug/ml), K-pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC>64 ug/ml), A-baumannii ATCC 17978 (MIC>64 ug/ml), P-aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>64 ug/ml), E-cloacae ATCC 14037 (MIC>64 ug/ml), M-tuberculosis H37RV (MIC>12.5 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Chu J, Koirala B, Forelli N, Vila-Farres X, Ternei MA, Ali T, Colosimo DA, Brady SF. 2020
Literature Information.Title: Synthetic-Bioinformatic Natural Product Antibiotics with Diverse Modes of Action.
